content.en: Viscoelastic flow modeling: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of modeling viscoelastic flows. These algorithms, such as EVSS/SUPG, EVSS-G, SUPG, DG, and spectral element methods, are being developed and tested to simulate both steady-state and unsteady viscoelastic flows. Additionally, new time marching schemes, domain perturbation techniques, and grid-by-grid inversion methods are being proposed to address stability issues in viscoelastic flow simulations.
content.da: Viskoelastisk strømningsmodellering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af modelleringen af viskoelastiske strømninger. Disse algoritmer, såsom EVSS/SUPG, EVSS-G, SUPG, DG, og spektrale elementmetoder, bliver udviklet og testet for at simulere både stationære og ustationære viskoelastiske strømninger. Derudover bliver nye tidsmarcheringsskemaer, domæneperturbationsteknikker og grid-for-grid inversionsmetoder foreslået for at løse stabilitetsproblemer i viskoelastiske strømningsimuleringer.
